name: ip_geolocation_lookup
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool ip_geolocation_lookup.
Tool description: API returns location data such as country, region, city, zip and more
API description: API returns location data such as country, region, city, zip, timezone, isp, asn and org and more

ip.description: The IPv4 address for which geolocation data is to be retrieved.
